name: Vespa crabro
Relationship: Compare: SCORPIO (salivation; strabismus; tetanus); APIS.Antidote: SEMPERVIVUM TECTOR., locally.

Female: Left ovary markedly affected, with frequent burning, micturition; sacral pains extending up back
Menstruation, preceded by depression, pain, pressure, and constipation
Skin: Boils; stinging and soreness, relieved by bathing with vinegar
Erythema multiforme, relieved by bathing with vinegar
Wheals, macules and swellings with burning, stinging and soreness
Face: Swelling of mouth and throat, with violent burning pains

details: Dizzy, better lying on back. Fainting. Numbness and blindness. Nausea and vomiting, followed by creeping chills from feet upward. Cramping pain in bowels. Axillary glands swollen with soreness of upper arms. Perspiration on parts laid on with itching.Skin and female symptoms marked. Indurated feeling. Vasomotor symptoms of skin and mucous membranes.
